meta.title: Create an Obituary
meta.description: Create a personalized obituary step by step with our free online tool.

title: Create an Obituary
subtitle: Follow the steps below to create a personalized obituary

step2.title: Basic Information
step2.placeOfPassingPlaceholder: e.g., at home, surrounded by family

step4.title: Family Members
step4.survivedByDesc: List family members and loved ones who survive
step4.precededByDesc: List family members who have previously passed
step4.name: Name

step5.title: Photo & Design
step5.description: Upload a photo and choose a visual theme for your obituary. These will appear in the visual preview and exported image/PDF.
step5.photoDescription: Upload a portrait photo of your loved one. This will be displayed in the header of your obituary.
step5.uploadPhotoDesc: Upload a portrait photo of your loved one. This will be displayed in the header of your obituary.
step5.themeDescription: Select a background theme for your obituary. You can always change this later in the editor.
step5.chooseThemeDesc: Select a background theme for your obituary. You can always change this later in the editor.

step6.title: Service Information (Optional)
step6.additionalPlaceholder: e.g., "In lieu of flowers, donations to the American Heart Association..."

traditional.label: Traditional / Formal
traditional.desc: Classic, dignified language following conventional obituary format.
traditional.sample: passed away peacefully on... was born in...

heartfelt.label: Warm / Heartfelt
heartfelt.desc: Emotional, personal tone that celebrates the person's life.
heartfelt.sample: With heavy hearts, we announce... brought light and warmth...

simple.label: Simple / Concise
simple.desc: Brief, straightforward announcement of passing and key details.
simple.sample: of [City] passed away on... will be remembered for...

religious.label: Religious / Spiritual
religious.desc: Faith-centered language with spiritual themes and scripture.
religious.sample: was called home to be with the Lord... a person of deep faith...

modern.label: Modern / Contemporary
modern.desc: Fresh, personal narrative that captures the person's unique spirit.
modern.sample: We lost an extraordinary person... lived every moment with purpose...

nav.draftSaved: Draft saved! You can continue later.
